channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description:
Wierd, I got the one my priest has for free from someone saying last year "Anyone want this [Truesilver Shafted Arrow] for free? Have 2". Guess I got lucky. I gues from your post I understand why people hate it so much when I summon him.
Boguht the picnic basket on a new stealth alt for 10g a few days in and now have a spare. Planning on keeping it for a few months, then sell for annoyingly large amounts of money...
item.content:encoded:
Wierd, I got the one my priest has for free from someone saying last year “Anyone want this [Truesilver Shafted Arrow] for free? Have 2”. Guess I got lucky. I gues from your post I understand why people hate it so much when I summon him.

Boguht the picnic basket on a new stealth alt for 10g a few days in and now have a spare. Planning on keeping it for a few months, then sell for annoyingly large amounts of money…

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Shutter 4tw. Tyr's Hand, another nest of the Scarlet Crusade.
item.content:encoded: Shutter 4tw. Tyr’s Hand, another nest of the Scarlet Crusade.

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description:
oh hey, i got the truesilver shafted arrow on one of my first love tokens in stormwind. had no idea what it was until i opened it. too bad, i would have sold it before i took it out of the box if i'd realized. =/
i do want the romantic picnic, but c'est la vie.
item.content:encoded:
oh hey, i got the truesilver shafted arrow on one of my first love tokens in stormwind. had no idea what it was until i opened it. too bad, i would have sold it before i took it out of the box if i’d realized. =/

i do want the romantic picnic, but c’est la vie.

item.title: By: BigFire
item.dc:creator: BigFire
item.description: I didn't have the patient to farm for the arrow. So I bought mine for mere 60g.
item.content:encoded: I didn’t have the patient to farm for the arrow. So I bought mine for mere 60g.

item.title: By: Nereus
item.dc:creator: Nereus
item.description: It took me over 200 of the pledges to finally get the Truesilver Shafted Arrow. It will be well worth it to annoy other players year round (plus it netted be PLENTY of romantic picnic baskets and silver shafted arrows to shoot at other people this week).
item.content:encoded: It took me over 200 of the pledges to finally get the Truesilver Shafted Arrow. It will be well worth it to annoy other players year round (plus it netted be PLENTY of romantic picnic baskets and silver shafted arrows to shoot at other people this week).

item.title: By: Ixxy
item.dc:creator: Ixxy
item.description: It's the Sentinals in Darnassus that are the Love Criminals!!! They mock you by accepting the first token and then the second and third they throw in your face and tell all their friend's nearby to do the same!
item.content:encoded: It’s the Sentinals in Darnassus that are the Love Criminals!!! They mock you by accepting the first token and then the second and third they throw in your face and tell all their friend’s nearby to do the same!
